summary.event: 41st IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME 2025)
summary.description: The IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME) is one of the premier academic conferences for researchers and practitioners working on the maintenance and evolution of software systems.
program_highlights: Cutting-edge research on software evolution, maintenance, and analysis
Invited keynotes by international thought leaders
Panels, tool demos, and community activities
Networking opportunities with researchers, practitioners, and students from around the globe
Conference reception and cultural activities in vibrant Auckland
summary.equality_commitment: ICSME 2025 aims to be environmentally conscious and socially inclusive, with arrangements to ensure accessibility and inclusivity for all attendees, including those from LGBTQ+, disabled, and neurodiverse communities.
summary.community_invitation: Spread the word via your local networks.
summary.academic_reputation: ICSME 2025 is sponsored by the IEEE Computer Society, with support from IEEE TCSE and other research organizations, welcoming support from industry and academic sponsors worldwide.
